body.p: The Knative Eventing add-on is used in the IBM BAMOE project for messaging. The IBM BAMOE Knative Eventing add-on enables your project to connect to a sink or make it a KogitoSource.
The add-on processes the K_SINK and K_CE_OVERRIDES environment variables injected by Knative Eventing controllers (SinkBinding or KogitoSource).

The service requires the IBM BAMOE Messaging and Quarkus HTTP connector libraries to wire the IBM BAMOE service with a given sink. The IBM BAMOE Messaging and Quarkus HTTP connector perform as dependencies for the Knative Eventing add-on.
